title: Ticket #5763: Add log file info to the admin section of the manual
description:
In documenting #5663, I was thinking that there should be some kind of section in the admin part of the manual that talks about logging. (Part of the reason that this occurred to me is that there's not really a good place to mention that the condor_c-gahp now logs TCP file transfer stats by default.)

Anyhow, I'm thinking that there should be a general logging section that tells you what to expect to see in $(LOG), what the meanings of the different files are, where to change what's in them, etc.

Right now about the only part of the manual that seems to refer to this is the config knob section, but it doesn't really tie things together.
creator: wenger
